fields.summary: MobileWeb: TabGroup: addTab results in Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read property of 'rightNavButton of undefined'
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio: 2.1.2.201208081810
Titanium SDK: 2.1.1, 2.1.2.v20120809183109
OS: Mountain Lion
Browsers Tested: Chrome 21.0.1180.57, Firefox 14.0.1

comments.body: I was able to run without problem when creating a window for each tab then specifying the windows during tab creation with "window:win1" and "window:win2".

Verified the issue exists on :
Titanium studio : 2.1.1.201207271312
SDK version : 2.2.0.v20120809153311 , 2.1.1 GA 
Android 4.0.4 - default ,chrome 18.0
Iphone 4.3.5 - safari mobile
Mountain lion(10.8) - chrome 21.0,safari 6,firefox 14.

1.It is seen only when we do not create a window for each tab & then specifying it â€” as mentioned by Eric in the bug.
2.Yes it is a regression . It does not happen on 2.1.0 GA.

Verified the fix.getting two tabs one green & other red.
Thus closing the issue.

Environment:
Ti Studio : 3.0.2.201302041757
Ti BB SDK : 3.0.2.v20130207164659
Mac OSX : 10.8.2
CLI Version : 3.0.24-cr
